word: Many were undeceived in regard to the claims of Rome. They saw how vain is the mediation of men or angels in behalf of the sinner. As the true light dawned upon their minds, they exclaimed with rejoicing, \93Christ is my priest; his blood is my sacrifice; his altar is my confessional.\94 They cast themselves wholly upon the merits of Jesus, repeating the words, \93Without faith it is impossible to please him.\94 [Hebrews 11:6.] \93There is none other name under heaven given among men, whereby we must be saved.\94 [Acts 4:12.]
